1.0.0.name: drupal/b2_nice_comments

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Replaces the comment section with a simple textbox, and expands the original form when clicked.

dev-1.x.name: drupal/b2_nice_comments

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Module that replaces the comment section with a simple textbox, and expands the original form when clicked. This gives a much cleaner look to the page.
